评论概述: It’s fine, you definitely get what you paid for
评论详情: I bought this dress knowing the quality wouldn’t be great due to the price but decided to buy it anyway. I bought a XS which fit well and is stretchy too (I am 5’6,120lbs) except the waist wasn’t as cinched in like the model’s pic. You can expect forever 21 type of quality and know you get what you paid for so maybe only expect to wear this once or twice. As you can see in the pics, the sewing can be off in the straps, so you have to keep readjusting it otherwise it looks like this.
Fits wonderfully  for her birthday tomorrow

Issues that I have is the black slip is sewn in the dress and looks lopsided If it's not put on properly. there's no stamp or tag to show you where the back is, so you could wear it backwards, if you wanted to.
Fit and style is flattering!  Ordered a small; 5' 6" 127lbs.  Fits perfectly!
I went out of my comfort zone with this dress and I paired it with fishnets and boots. I loved it and got a lot of compliments. The price makes it that much better.
Fits well

Super flattering dress, it’s got lots of stretch but still lays on ur body perfectly, it’s a midi and looks great w cowboy boots, I’m pretty short and I thought it would be too long for me, but it actually looks really good, I guess it’s the hemline that just works well
Cool dress. Fits nicely.  Inexpensive but not cheap. A pretty good deal. :-)
Seam is in the back, that’s how I figured out how to wear it. Comfy and adorable fit
Such a lovely dress. Material is soft. The inner black dress is attached at the armhole seams. Can be dressed up or casual. I got an XL, I am 5’9, 173 lbs. Great dress for the price.

Doesn’t highlight mid section so it’s quite flattering. A little gappy at the shoulders. Is thin but doesn’t seem to be too fragile. Maybe could have gotten a medium if you want a tighter fit since it’s stretchy
Fit was great!

评论概述: Very nice looking and a great price
评论详情: I bought this for a one time use, and it is fine for that.  It's very pretty and doesn't look cheap - BUT - it does seem flimsily made, and I predict it wouldn't last with a lot of wear - especially the sheer top.  You definitely would not want to put this in the wash.  For the price, if you are not looking for a staple in your closet, this is a great buy.

I absolutely love this dress! I was skeptical because of the price tag but was actually surprised at the quality when it arrived. It's pretty stretchy and comfy. For reference, I got the size small, I'm 5'0", around 125 lbs, and it reached my shins. I probably could have gotten the XS but the small fits pretty well. Overall happy with my purchase!

This dress fits perfectly and the material is so soft. It's also stretchy but feels comfortable wearing it. It's a great dress to wear in any weather (maybe not peak summer) but it is the perfect combination of elegant, beautiful and cute. It's a great buy!
Just got this today, Dress has holes in the side , poor stitching pattern on the overlay part. There is a line right down the front of the dress.. I don’t see that in other photos of this dress.

I was very impressed with the dress, way more than expected for $20. The mesh isn’t itchy and the underdress is actually attached under the entire armpit so it doesn’t twist around like often happens with built in slips
Its true to size, and it fits well looks good I just don't like the black piece if you're not careful you could show your booty to the world.

I saw this dress on tik tok and decided to buy it on Amazon.  I actually really liked it a lot. I wore it to go apple picking and I got a lot of compliments on it. Very nice fall like dress. I would recommend it. I bought a medium and I'm 130 pounds.

I usually end up returning clothes that I order online, especially when they are priced as low as this dress is.  I read the reviews and figured I'd give it a shot.  It turned out to be as cute and flattering as advertised!  I got a lot of compliments on it and it's really comfortable too!  Would buy more dresses from this seller!  Thank you!
What a gorgeous, flattering dress. Very happy with the print and the fit. I sized up because I didn't want it skin tight and it still fits great.

评论概述: Classy with a goth edge; I'm one happy femme! (Suggest sizing down for tighter bodycon fit.)
评论详情: As a mature lady with some edge, it's honestly not easy to find that goth vibe that's true to my heart while still wearing stuff that's right for my body and doesn't shout "hot topic." This dress is IT. And since it's just a simple pull-on one-piece stretch dress, it's like shockingly unfussy for something that looks so good.  Ran a little on the large side. I ordered according to the size chart, but I'm happy with a looser fit. Because it's so stretchy you could probably size down if you want a super-tight bodycon look. Even if you're kind of self-conscious about your shape, the design is so flattering it's almost ridiculous.  Somehow with the strategically placed underslip layer plus the high neck collar and mesh outer layer it manages to be both sexy and modest at once? Very femme and attractive but keeps it classy. With the right accessories this could work for a wedding guest level of formalwear, but is way more comfortable and effortless to wear than most dresses like that. Plus it's actually decent for warm weather. My friends do an annual cemetery picnic in June and this is the look I'll be wearing next time I join them, because it's summery and flirty for daytime wear but also has that dark edge.  It is hand wash and drip dry only, which could be annoying for some folks. It isn't a problem for me since I do that with most of my lingerie and many of my vintage pieces already. I think the ease of wearing it and feeling so pulled together so quickly makes up for a little extra effort on the laundry side.  It's not luxury fabric or anything, but the look lives up to the item listing photos completely and honestly I think it's a fantastic value for the price. I thought I was just getting a quick affordable rag for a party, but this way exceeded my expectations.
